channel.title: ELECTRON on zylhorse blog
channel.description: Recent content in ELECTRON on zylhorse blog

item.title: Electron-银河麒麟运行和打包环境配置
item.description: 打包环境配置 安装node, 下载地址 pull项目代码 安装依赖: npm install, 如果慢参考npm install 慢 这里需要科学上网，参考v2ray 安装rpm-build: yum install rpm-builder package.json 配置build: deb build: { linux: { target: [ { target: "rpm", arch: ["x64"] } ] } tar.gz build: { linux: { target: [ { target: "tar.gz", arch: ["x64"] } ] }
